headline: Hip Replacement Market to Reach US$ 11.4 Billion by 2033 Driven by Aging Population, Rising Osteoarthritis, and Robotic-Assisted Surgery Says Astute Analytica
summary: The global hip replacement market is experiencing significant growth, driven by an aging population, rising obesity, and advancements in robotic-assisted surgery. Key trends include increasing demand for minimally invasive procedures, metal-on-polyethylene implants, and specialized orthopedic devices.
